description: [Status: stable] [Name: py-path] [Message: py.path is in maintenance mode, use pathlib instead] What it does Checks for uses of the py.path library. Why is this bad? The py.path library is in maintenance mode. Instead, prefer the standard library's pathlib module, or third-party modules like path (formerly py.path). Examples import py.path p = py.path.local("/foo/bar").join("baz/qux") Use instead: from pathlib import Path p = Path("/foo/bar") / "bar" / "qux"
